title: Top Places to visit in Marigaon, Assam
content: Morigaon is a town of the town area committee and the district headquarters of Morigaon district in the Indian state of Assam and including the headquarters of The Tiwa Autonomous Council (TAC), Tiwashong, Assam which was constituted by the Government of Assam on 14 April 1995, The Apex council w

title: Top Places to visit in Mariani, Assam
content: Mariani is a neighbourhood town of Jorhat. It is about 17.5 km from Jorhat railway station. Mariani is on the border of Nagaland. Mariani is famous for the Gibbon Wildlife Sanctuary which is located on the roadside on the way to Nakachari from Mariani at a distance of 5 km. Pincode of Mariani is

title: Top Places to visit in Margherita, Assam
content: Margherita is a census town in Tinsukia district in the Indian state of Assam. The small sub-divisional town has scenic beauty and is surrounded by hills, tea gardens, forests and the Dihing River. It has a beautiful golf course at the foot of the hills and a small stream running through. Althoug

title: Tourist places in Mangaldoi, Assam
content: Mangaldai also spelled Mangaldoi is a town in the Indian state of Assam. It was named after Mangaldahi, who was the daughter of the Rajah of Darrang and was married to Susenghphaa (r. 1603–1641), (also Pratap Singha), a ruler of the Ahom kingdom. title: Top Places to visit in Lumding, Assam
content:
Lumding is a city with a municipal board in the Hojai district in the Indian state of Assam.

title: Top Places to visit in Lanka, Assam
content: Lanka is a town and a town area committee in Hojai district in the Indian state of Assam. Lanka's name is probably given after the name Lanka of Ramayana. Assamese poet Madhava Kandali was said to be an inhabitant of Lanka, who wrote Saptakanda Ramayana, under the patronage of Varāha-Rājā Mahaman

title: Tourist places in Barpeta, Assam
content: Barpeta is a town in Barpeta district of the state of Assam in India and is district headquarters. The city is located 90 kilometres (56 mi) north-west of Guwahati and is one of the major cities in Western Assam. It is also called Satra Nagari (Temple town) of Assam due to the presence of various

title: Top Places to visit in Pasighat, Arunachal Pradesh
content: Pasighat is the headquarter of East Siang district in the Indian state of Arunachal Pradesh. Situated at the eastern foothills of the Himalayas at 155 meters above mean sea level, Pasighat is Arunachal's oldest town. The Government of India included Pasighat in the Smart Cities Mission developmen

title: Top Places to visit in Naharlagun, Arunachal Pradesh
content:
Naharlagun is a town situated in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian state of Arunachal Pradesh.
 
Geography

title: Top Places to visit in Piler, Andhra Pradesh
content: Pileru is a census town in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the mandal headquarters of Pileru mandal in Madanapalle revenue division  It passes through a river and hence it got the name Pileru. title: Top Places to visit in Dhone, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Dhone or Dronachalam is a town in Kurnool district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a Municipality located in Dhone Mandal.
History

title: Top Places to visit in Yerraguntla, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Yerraguntla is a Leading Industrial town in Kadapa district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Yerraguntla Mandal of Kadapa revenue division.
Geography
Yerraguntla is located at 14.6333°N 78.5333°E. It has an average elevation of 152 meters (501 feet).
